description.description: A concise description of the most prominent object or area in the image.

grid_labels.description: A 16x9 grid of labels. Each label is a short (1-3 word) description of the most salient object or feature within that grid cell. If a cell is empty or unremarkable, use 'empty'.

actionable_cells.description: A list of [row, col] coordinates (0-indexed) for cells that contain clearly actionable UI elements (buttons, links, input fields).
